transcript:
Agent: Hello, my name is John and I'm calling from XYZ Corporation. How are you today?
Customer: I'm doing well, thanks. Who is this again?
Agent: My name is John, and I'm calling about our new energy-efficient water heaters.
Customer: Oh, okay. We're actually in the market for a new water heater.
Agent: Great timing! Our product is top-of-the-line and can save you up to 30% on your energy bills.
Customer: That sounds interesting. What makes it so efficient?
Agent: Our water heater uses advanced technology to minimize heat loss and optimize performance.
Customer: I see. And how much does it cost?
Agent: The price starts at $1,200, but we're currently offering a discount for first-time customers.
Customer: Okay, that's a bit higher than I was expecting. What kind of warranty do you offer?
Agent: We offer a 10-year warranty on parts and labor, and dedicated customer support.
Customer: That sounds good. Can you tell me more about the installation process?
Agent: Absolutely. We have a team of certified technicians who will install the water heater for you.
Customer: Okay, I think I'm interested. Can you send me a quote and some more information?
Agent: I'd be happy to. I'll send you an email with all the details. Would you like to schedule an installation appointment?
Customer: Yes, that would be great. Thank you for your time, John.
Agent: You're welcome. I'll talk to you soon.
